name: Travelon Anti-Theft Signature Quilted Slim Pouch
product_description: The Anti-Theft Signature Quilted Slim Pouch has a small frame but still features a roomy enough interior to keep all your essentials at your side. The deep main compartment has 3 RFID blocking card slots, a RFID Passport Pocket, a zippered wall pocket, a tethered key clip plus it is deep enough to carry a Mini iPad. The slash and cut resistant shoulder strap is adjustable allowing you to find the perfect fit and the locking swivel clasp prevents the strap from tangling plus it can be attached to a stationary object to prevent a grab-no-go. The front flap pocket has a hidden magnetic closure to keep your items secure and is perfect for quick grab items. A front slash pocket keeps your smartphone easily accessible and the rear zipper pocket keeps your items organized. This bag is versatile and can be carried as a Crossbody for hands-free convenience or traditionally over your shoulder. Made from durable nylon material an accented in beautiful antique brass finished hardware. The timeless shape and minimalist style mean you can carry this bag season after season and always look on trend.

name: Small Sling Backpack Crossbody Sling Bag for Women, Chest Bag Daypack Fanny Pack Cross Body Bag for Outdoors Hiking Traveling - Black
short_description: The sling bag made with high-quality tear and water-resistant polyester material, which provides extra strength and long-lasting performance. Breathable mesh shoulder straps help reduce pressure on your shoulders and keep you comfortable.

The adjustable strap can adjust to most sizes for comfortable wear of the small bag on your front or back. The shoulder sling bag strap is long enough to adjust from 22 inch to 43 inch, Perfectly fit your body.

Dimension: 11.2" x 6.1" x 3.2" (Please Note The Bag Dimension). The Sling bag with multiple compartments and pockets, can hold your phone, wallet, cards, passport, key and any essentials in daily life. Internal zipper pocket is safe for protecting your valuable items inside.
The chest bag provides enough space for hiking, camping, outdoor, cycling and shopping. It is easy to carry and use. Perfect for work, vacation and any outdoor activities.
Can be used as sling bag / chest bag / cross body bag / hiking backpack / shoulder bag. It is a great gift for women, moms, wife, friends on Mother's Day, Christmas, Holidays, Valentine's Day.
